meanings.def: a game played especially in the US by two teams of nine players, using a bat and ball. Each player tries to hit the ball and then run around four bases before the other team can return the ball.
the ball used in this game

examples: He taught New York baseball fans a good deal of inside baseball.
Readers weren't very interested in the inside baseball of the news business.
